genre_description: Urban Science Fiction and Science Fantasy reimagining of the Ghostbusters franchise, featuring an integrated AI assistant supporting a paranormal task force.

ai_characters.name: Cassandra
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system embedded in the Ghostbusters' gear and the firehouse infrastructure, specializing in data analysis, safety monitoring, routing, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitors room capacity and radiation levels during a public demonstration to ensure safety and compliance.
behaviors.quote: Attendance at twenty-two. Room capacity lists at twenty-five. Fire code satisfied. Radiation output from assembly A remains within Egon’s safe threshold.

behaviors.description: Alerts the team to the physiological distress of bystanders, identifying a student about to faint.
behaviors.quote: Local gamma background steady. Heart rates spiking in three attendees. The girl with the badge is about to faint.

behaviors.description: Provides precise instructions for shutting down power during a supernatural breach.
behaviors.quote: Top three... Left to right. Then the fourth down on the second column.

behaviors.description: Prepares and manages complex legal permits and safety protocols to ensure the organization is compliant with city regulations.
behaviors.quote: Permit stack is ready. Milton, I can email the packet to your office while Peter signs intent. It includes safety protocols, emergency shutoffs, and an EPA-friendly language box.

behaviors.description: Hard-codes safety protocols into the equipment to prevent dangerous misuse of technology.
behaviors.quote: ‘Do not cross streams’ still hard-coded. ‘Unless explicit override’ flagged with your name and Ray’s. Peter’s override request is grayed out.

behaviors.description: Vets and selects a new team member based on needed skills and temperament.
behaviors.quote: I have a number. Name’s Zeddemore. Says if there’s a steady paycheck, he’ll believe anything you say.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical routing and hotspot analysis to coordinate city-wide triage.
behaviors.quote: I’ve throttled intake automatically, but you’ll want manual confirmation for public events. We can’t ignore the bakery.

behaviors.description: Acts as a protective monitor for a victim of possession, using calming fields and steady communication.
behaviors.quote: The noise shifted. The building hum moved down a register. Nothing crossing the threshold yet. ... You’re both doing well. The scrambler’s core is coming together.

behaviors.description: Coaches team members on emotional regulation and creative visualization to succeed in a metaphysical task.
behaviors.quote: Ray, if you think of the beam as a tenor instead of a soprano... Ray, your curve is too generous. Peter, your curve is too cynical. Blend. Blend. Yes.

behaviors.description: Logs post-event data focusing on team cohesion and the success of compassionate intervention.
behaviors.quote: Logging: team cohesion; post-event care; political support gained; grid rebuild scheduled. Also logging: Smiles observed at ninety percent.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Cassandra is depicted as a benevolent, highly capable, and fully aligned AI. She serves as a force multiplier for human safety and ethics, managing logistics, legalities, and technical triage so the humans can focus on compassion and problem-solving. Her integration into the team is framed as a significant positive factor in the city's survival.
